Question
========

Suppose you want to predict future values of $y_t$. Which of the following statements is correct? 

Answerlist
----------

*  You cannot make predictions for  future values of $y_t$ using linear regression model
*  Averaging forecasts from random forest algorithm and ETS model will improve forecast quality 
*  When working with weekly data adding $L^7y_t$ as a regressor can improve forecast quality
*  An example of growing window function is mean of 2 previous values 

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

*  False. You can!
*  False. It depends on data
*  True. 
*  False. It's a sliding window function
